cleaned_text: At Pedre Integrative Health we specialize in a variety of general primary care and preventative services for our patients. This includes the management of the following: - Minor illnesses - Skin infections and rashes - Diagnosis of new conditions - Complex and chronic diseases - Traveler's health - Musculoskeletal disorders - Mental health For a more complete list of the most common medical conditions seen and treated,
